text: Hello!
Hi there, what are your feelings on the donation?
I feel that the organization is wonderful. It's called Save the Children. Have you heard of it?
I have, what a great cause.
Yep! It's essential to ensure a children's right to health, education, and safety. How do you feel about those things?
There is really nothing more important than those things to ensure our future is bright.
I completely agree with you! Would you be willing to donate any of your task payment to it?
I am considering it, what are your thoughts on donating?  Have you donated before?
Donating makes me feel like I've done good, when I can't do a lot. Especially when every bit truly counts.
I agree, what do you think would be a fair donation from your task payment?
I'm willing to do all of my $2, just because although it's not much to me, it can mean the world of a difference to a child. What about you?
I would probably do $.75.  Unfortunately I am trying to save some extra money to pay some medical bills, but I feel I could help a little.
I understand. I will keep mine the same.
That is really nice of you.  I am sure everyone will appreciate the donation.
I sure hope so! I will donate $2, and you will donate $.75. We will be able to make a difference!
No doubt.  Do you often give to charity?  I try as often as I can, it is so hard to help everyone in need.
I volunteer more!
Yes, I have done habitat for humanity before, it made me feel like I really made a difference.
I agree with you!
Anyway, I think we have an agreement, it has been a pleasure speaking with you.
